title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Serebryanka, Spirne, of Donetsk region. Russia...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Serebryanka, Spirne, of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Yampolivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
